A source told The News Of The World: The` Xtra Factor' job would be great for Georgie Thompson . She'll be fantastic. Konnie Huq , 35, was drafted in last year to replace Holly Willoughby but was said to have angered Simon Cowell by making a series of blunders which led to viewers to campaign on entertainment websites for her sacking.
